title: Video game consumer market value worldwide 2011 - 2021 , by distribution
summary: Overall DLC market is gradually increasing, Package market is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Package market, and lastly, 2. DLC market.
DLC market reported the lowest Value in billion USD about 7.4 in Year 2013
The greatest difference of Value in billion USD between DLC market and Package market occurs at Year 2013 and the smallest difference occurs at 2015.
